original_text: And it shall be as the chased roe, and as a sheep that no man taketh up: they shall every man turn to his own people, and flee every one into his own land.
korean_text: 그들이 쫓긴 노루나 모으는 자 없는 양 같이 각기 자기 동족에게로 돌아가며 각기 본향으로 도망할 것이나

sentences.original_text: And it shall be as the chased roe
and as a sheep that no man taketh up
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 거두지 않는 양과 같을 것이라

sentences.original_text: they shall every man turn to his own people
and flee every one into his own land
